availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Willliam Cox (justice of the peace, carroll county)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Emily M. Cox. Father of John D. Cox, Richard Cox, Kate Cox, William Cox, and Nancy Cox. Farmer in Carroll County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Carroll County in 1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 2, p. 73. KYR-0001-004-0157.
